mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ENCTRCTBSSGMT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACTCODE = #{ContractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATECODE = #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDTYPE = #{IDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDNUM = #{IDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNGMTORGCODE = #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{CtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CONTRACTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE,REPORTFLAG,SOURCESYS,ORG_CODE from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCTRCTBSSGMT where CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{CtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CONTRACTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE,REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCTRCTBSSGMT
select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_EnCtrctBsSgmt eb where 1=1
select info.* from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCTRCTBSSGMT info where info.CtrctBsSgmtSeqNo= #{CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENCTRCTBSSGMTM (CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CONTRACTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE,REPORTFLAG,etl_date ) select CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, CONTRACTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE,'0',to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_ENCTRCTBSSGMT where CTRCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{CtrctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
